description:
Eiyu runs into Shio on the bus and then runs into Akari on his way home.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Full Bus? Drenched in Rain? Feelings Exposed? Admiring Them? Still Won`t Start a Rom-Com
Man`in Bus de mo Ame ni Nurete mo Suki ga Barete mo Akogarete mo Lovecome ni Naranai
満員バスでも雨に濡れても好きがバレても憧れてもラブコメにならない
